events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was reviewed, and the case has been classified under the refund category due to the customer's request.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item delivery.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request regarding the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 12345678. I have attached a picture clearly showing the item does not match what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method and send you a confirmation email shortly.
Thank you for your prompt response and resolution. I appreciate your quick action on this matter.
The refund has been successfully processed, and you should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with the resolution provided.
I confirm that I have received the refund and am very happy with how quickly you handled the issue. Thanks again!
The case has been officially closed following the successful refund and confirmation from the customer.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather feedback about the support and refund experience.
